text: "kanthawan muhuna sudu wenna aalepa karana krimwala rasadiya wadiyen adangu baw chinaye karana lada paryeshanayakin anawaranaya wuna.

kohomahari me lagadi niyama wadak aaranchi unamage yaluwek innawa thattu 5k withara usa plat ekak ooke inne ithali ayata wada wideshikayo ,kohoma hari eka paratama me plat ekama mara kunu gadak gahanna aragena eka geyak wahala ee gedarin lu enne ee gedara idala thiyenne morokko minihek witharalu uuth hena jalthara porak lu, me anith gewal wala inna un hithala thiyenne mu marila kiyala mun polisiyata enawalu, tikakin polisiya aawalu polis kar 20k withara,ara gas wes muhunu dagena nikan hena meheyumakata yanawa wage,,ara ingrisi pichar wala enne thuwakku managena ee wage,,,aa thawa gininiwana wahanayak,,ambiyulans ekak, polisi deka thunakinma wahana,,awilla kaduwalu dora baladdi aru mokak hari kes ekakata gedarin panala gihin mu kanna genapu mas wagayak mese uda dala gihinlu eeka kunu wela gada awilla thiyenne,,ane kattiya aapahu harila giyalu munu papadam wage karagena.

mema thiranaya athhituwimata janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha thiranaya kara aththe janadhipathi jyeshta upadeshakayange upades anuwa bawada warthawe.

eyin raha watunu saha keti kalina aarthika mithya walin andha bhakthikawu janadhipathi hiyugo chawes thama balaya thahuwuru kara ganima pinisa "chawismo" namathi janathawadi yi kiya gath prathipaththi anugamanaya keleya.

eheth methana di ranga wisin janamadhyawediyaku lesa nowa, samuha janamadhyawedi ghathana siddhiyak pariksha kirimata giya jathyanthara janamadhya widwath kandayamaka wagakiwayuthu samajikayaku lesa darunu aacharadharma kadakirimak karanu laba athayi api wishwasa karamu.

mowun samanga, widhayaka kamitu samajikayaku lesa katayuthu karana priyantha algama mahatha ha jayantha mahathage sambandhikaraka shibli wilkasim mahatha da siya dhurawalin illa aswimata sudanamwana bawa pawase.

pera pinata wage pahala wechcha yaluwo, bos la hitiya nisa wahana nikanma labuna magul dawase saha hom kamin dawase.
wahansa, yam pungalek aathmaparithapananuyogayehi yedune thama thawanuye we da me pungul mage sitha no pahadawayi.

karunu mese heyin, parlimenthuwe wiruddha parshwaye nayaka dhuraya sambandhayen me awasthawedi wenasak kirimata wyawasthanukulawath, sampradayanukulawath, me uththarithara sabhawe kathanayakawaraya lesa mata hakiyawak nopawathina bawa mage awasana thiranaya lesa meyin prakashayata path karami.
widyapathi (em es si) upadhiyakin da kathikacharya dhurayak labiya hakiwa thibu bawin ma upadeshakawarayata pawasuwe widyapathi upadhiyak laba aapasu yana bawa ya.
“alis oya dana wismitha da?”, “pinokiyo darata aran” wani nirmana thula eya daknata labe.

udu koniyawa kamaragatha kota athi ruparamuwaka, gal wiharaye uththunga pilimaya pamula minis podiye, dashaka gananawakata pera drawida samajaya hara piya pamini thawamath ada eeye ese pamini aakarayen kadunu sinhala katha karana parwathi nam drawida gahaniyada randawa aththe ebawini.
kali kowile aawathewa katayuthu sandaha dhanushka balahathkarayenma sambandha wuweya.
amarikawe amarikanuwo wage sinhalaye sinhalayo.

wyawastha sanshodhanaya samanya panathak lesa parlimenthuwata idiripathkala yuthu bawa pawasana wipaksha nayakawaraya hadisi panathak lesa rajaya eya idiripathkala hoth eeta wiruddha wimata siduwana bawayi pawasuwe.
ehidi si.si.ti.wi. kamarawala satahanwa thibu darshana saha wimarshana anuwa sakakaru athadanguwata gena adhikaranaye niyoga matha rimand bharayata pamunuwa thibina.

thama saha wijewira 1971 marthu 15 madakalapuwe sita kolambaa rimanng bandhanagarayata gena aa bawada edina udasana 11.00 pamini osmange amma saha kumanayakata wijewira thama idiripitadi kiya sitiye lokuathula saha sanathta prashna amathaka karagena pasubasina lesath aayudha hanga disthrikka maru karana lesa bawada keli senanayaka prakasha karayi.

ma punaruda wyaparaye sakachcha sabhawakata giya awasthawakadi sakachcha sabhawa awasanaye ma wetha pamini pudgalayek mata pamanak asena lesa apuru adahasak ma wetha pala kaleya.

sanwidhanaye mithuru mithuriyan ekka kaluthara,katukurunda mak shri lama/wadihiti saha wishesha awashyatha sahitha wuwange niwasata goda wennata ,matath awasthawak labuna.dinayak purawata pawathwunu wadasatahana ; ema sthanaya saha awata parisaraya pirisidu kirima , ema sthanaye sitina karya mandalaya ha ekwa, ehi newasika samajika, samajikawanta awashya diwa aharaya sudanam kirima saha eewa owunta piliganwima , owunta athyawashya badu bhanda rashiyak pradanaya kirima saha naththal karol gi prasangayak pawathwa owun samanga ekwa gi gayamin saha natamin winodawima yana anga rasakin paripurna wela thibuna.
